meanings.definition: Having the most characteristics of an egg.
meanings.sent1: The omelette was the eggiest dish on the menu.
meanings.sent2: The boiled egg looked the eggiest out of all the breakfast options.
meanings.sent3: The eggiest cake in the bakery was surprisingly popular.
meanings.sent4: Her sunny-side-up smile was the eggiest thing about her.
meanings.sent5: The eggiest smell filled the kitchen as the chef cracked open the eggs.

meanings.definition: Showing the most resemblance to an egg.
meanings.sent1: The eggiest painting in the gallery was a masterpiece of realism.
meanings.sent2: The costume designer created the eggiest outfit for the play's chicken character.
meanings.sent3: The eggiest cloud in the sky looked like a giant egg floating above.
meanings.sent4: Her hair, dyed a pale yellow, was the eggiest hairstyle at the party.
meanings.sent5: The eggiest toy in the store was a plush egg with a surprise inside.
